discourse_list.title: Roadmap - The Road to Multi-Collateral Dai

content.content: I haven’t seen much discussion about the roadmap yet but there is one thing that I find a bit peculiar and that is when the MCD Whitepaper will be published. It seems so late in the entire process? This doesn’t leave much room to thoroughly review it since the system should be going live fairly soon after its release?
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the roadmap for Multi-Collateral Dai and raises a concern about the timing of the release of the MCD Whitepaper. The author asks a question about the release date and expresses concern about the limited time for review before the system goes live. A 3rd party gives constructive criticism by agreeing with the concern and suggesting that the release date should be earlier. The post also explains the proposal for Multi-Collateral Dai.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: If you check post: https://forum.makerdao.com/t/mandate-interim-governance-facilitators Week of September 16   Proposal -  MCD Whitepaper
